name: Apple Music Student Plan
description: Apple Music plus Apple TV+ for $5.99/month for college students
fullDescription: Apple Music offers college students a discounted rate of $5.99/month (normally $10.99), including Apple TV+ for free. Available for up to 48 months while enrolled.
whatTheyOffer:
- Apple Music for $5.99/month (45% off)
- Apple TV+ included at no extra cost
- Full access to 100+ million songs
- Ad-free listening
- Lossless audio and spatial audio
- Available for up to 48 months
howToGetIt:
1. Open Apple Music app or visit music.apple.com
2. Sign up for Student plan
3. Verify enrollment through UNiDAYS
4. Must be enrolled at university or college
5. Re-verify enrollment periodically
keywords: Apple Music, student discount, music streaming, Apple TV+, college, university, 50% off
